Name: Foxus
About the game: Foxus is a relaxing action-adventure video game. Head off on an adventure in the magical forest of Alandia and resolve its mysteries. EXPLORE THE FOREST AND ITS SURROUNDINGS Take a walk through the serene forests and valleys of Alandia. MEET THE INHABITANTS Along the way you will meet new quaint characters. COLLECT 'EM ALL Collect strawberries and other items as you progress through your adventure.
Meta Title: Foxus: Feb 27, 2018, Vladimir Maslov and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Foxus? Check out the release date (Feb 27, 2018), developer insights from Vladimir Maslov, and a complete game summary.
